tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited as per our schedule and it took hardly 10min for us to meet Dr. he explained everything in detail and was very friendly. Loved the way he spoke with patients and made them comfortable.. Surely among the top Dr you‚Äôll find in Hyderabad üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I‚Äôm not completely done with my root canal therapy yet (still have a few sittings to go ) .The doctors seemed experienced and so far the process has been a breeze- No pain , they prepare you for how you‚Äôre going to feel after procedures and make sure you‚Äôre comfortable . I had a small cavity on my upper incisor , Dr Chandrashekhar did such a good job filling that up I couldn‚Äôt even tell where the cavity was after he finished .The dentists are super friendly and the entire staff follows strict covid precautions . Each patient is given a hair net , gloves and disposable shoe covers as soon as they step into the reception/waiting area . I was happy with the efficiency , expertise of the doctors present and the minimal wait time(appointments are scheduled for patients so it‚Äôs not crowded). It‚Äôs very difficult to feel comfortable in public spaces during covid , especially at the dentist but there was no cause for worry here . 
I‚Äôm honestly going to recommend Dr Chandrashekhar to everyone , he‚Äôs very clear with what needs to be done , doesn‚Äôt suggest any unnecessary dental work , seems very experienced , makes sure he and all of his staff follow strict sterile methods and is very professional .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Had a very good experience while visiting the clinic. Dr Chandra Sekhar and Dr Taha did an excellent job. Got no pain while getting the treatment done. And the best part is they will not advice you to remove the original teeth. They will work best for you and then of course will give suggestion for future treatment. Overall it was good.
Thank yoh doctor and the staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hi I'm Mrs Ali Khan.i would like to share my experience at Dr G Chandrashekhar's clinic.What I liked is that the Dr is very experienced and expert in his diagonose straight to the remedy for your problem. No unnecessary x-rays The Dr is very soft and treis to understand your problem and advises the treatment accordingly.The entire staff is very nice and friendly The junior doctors too are good at their work .The clinic is neat and clean .I strongly recommend the clinic for anyone wanting treatment for their teeth .And last of all its reasonably priced

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor and his complete team were very polite, ************* *** ******* ** *********. They quickly understood the problem. Also, they were very fast in providing accurate solutions.They were very professional in doing voluntary follow ups with patients,  after treatments.  We are overall happy  and highly satisfied with Dr.Chandrasekhar Garu dental clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,

review: If you are looking for a solution in one shot I wud say this is the Doc you should go to. Just follow his advice blindly and your problem is gone, he takes care of it. It's been many years of observation and all patients I sent here are happy with the Doc and his services and maily his approach and advise.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He is our family dentist for the last 30 years. He is very nice and very much skillful in his job.He is honest. He always tries to save the tooth to give optimum service.  I have recommended many of my friends and relatives who were satisfied with the treatment of Dr Chandrasekhar.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I  trust him implicitly, value his judgement always, feel safe as he knows I am a bad patient    . He is  truly the best and I know him for so many decades... 
Hard to describe  Shekhar, a humane and wonderful doctor, and a wonderful human being.... 
He has been seeing me for decades now.. and I refer every one to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Staff overall is friendly and courteous. It would be more professional if all caregivers wear a name tag and introduce themselves to the patient, specially at the first visit. They should also take time to clearly communicate every step the patient needs to go through in the clinic.
That said, I would recommend Dr. Chandra Sekhar to others without any reservation.
